titleStmt.title: The lives, opinions, and remarkable sayings of the most famous ancient philosophers. The first volume written in Greek, by Diogenes Laertius ; made English by several hands ...
De vitis philosophorum. English
titleStmt.author: Diogenes Laertius.

notesStmt.note: Contains engraved frontispiece portrait of Diogenes Laertius.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
